description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Plasmania is a fast paced collection game where you attempt to collect as many blue plasma balls as you can while avoiding the red. The bigger you are the more points per ball, but the harder it is to maneuver around the red. See how high you can score!
description.short: Plasmania is a fast paced collection game where you attempt to collect as many blue plasma balls as you can while avoiding the red. The bigger you are the more points per ball, but the harder it is to maneuver around the red. See how high you can score!
